rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg001
rows.name: Hmmm, so this is Tora's house?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg002
rows.name:
Don't touch everything! I have
many precious items in here!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg003
rows.name: Huh? What's this?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg004
rows.name:
Hey! Don't touch that!
That's off-limits!!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg005
rows.name:
This frilly thing looks like a
swimsuit. Is this another component?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg006
rows.name: That's special armor just for Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg007
rows.name: Armor? This tiny thing?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg008
rows.name:
This covers even less than her
current outfit. It can't possibly
provide any protection, can it?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg009
rows.name: This is Super Bikini Armor, mo.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg010
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]A Super-Bikini Armor?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg011
rows.name:
That's right. It's the
latest type of armor that
everyone yearns for, mo.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg012
rows.name:
Plus, the sections that get
hit automatically detach!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg013
rows.name:
...You mean that if it
gets hit, it comes off?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg014
rows.name:
That is right, this
state-of-the-art armor!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg015
rows.name:
...Tora, what exactly is
the meaning of this?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg018
rows.name: Mo mo...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg019
rows.name: How to deal with Kagutsuchi's anger?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg016
rows.name: Explain properly.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg017
rows.name: Stand your ground.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg119
rows.name:
I-If you just listen to my
explanation, it'll all make sense!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg101
rows.name:
You better have a good
explanation for this.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg102
rows.name:
I didn't make this! This has
absolutely nothing to do with me!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg103
rows.name:
This creation of Dad and
Grampypon. Tora never used!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg104
rows.name: Is this true, Hana?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg105
rows.name:
Yes, this armor was originally
designed by Professor Senzo.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg106
rows.name:
Furthermore, Professor
Tatezo improved the design
and completed it as armor.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg107
rows.name: Oh? Is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg108
rows.name: Exactly! I had nothing to do with it!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg109
rows.name:
Masterpon just added the purge
system to the armor, that's all.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg110
rows.name: Mo...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg111
rows.name:
A supreme system created
with utter dedication,
forgetting sleep and food...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg112
rows.name:
And that's how the greatest bikini
armor in the world was created!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg113
rows.name:
Oh, really? That's...quite
impressive, Tora...

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg114
rows.name: Hana, Hana... You're making this worse!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg115
rows.name:
Why? This is a good opportunity
to convey Master's feelings
to everyone, mo.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg116
rows.name:
Yes, let's hear all the
details, shall we?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg117
rows.name: Especially what you think about women.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg118
rows.name: Mo mo?!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg214
rows.name: Ahem!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg215
rows.name:
This armor embodies the aspirations
of my Grampypon and Dad!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg216
rows.name:
It's the culmination of
three generations' dreams!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg201
rows.name: How can you possibly defend this?!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg202
rows.name:
Incidentally, Masterpon
added the purge system.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg203
rows.name: It's a man's dream!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg204
rows.name:
Your fantasies don't matter here!
Don't you feel sorry for Hana having
to wear something like this?!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg205
rows.name: Tora-kun, you are the worst.

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg206
rows.name: Master, is Hana pitiful?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg207
rows.name: No way, that's not true!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg208
rows.name:
Hana is the luckiest girl in the
world to wear this special armor!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg209
rows.name:
We need to destroy this
thing. Homura, could you
please burn it to ashes?

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg210
rows.name: Yes, leave it to me!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg211
rows.name: No! I won't allow that!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg212
rows.name:
Come here, Tora! Come here and
explain yourself properly!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg213
rows.name: Kagutsuchi, stop! That's hot!

rows.label: kizunatalk009_msg217
rows.name: It burns!
